name: Defender (itch) (Pen_Dev)
description:
The Game is a small one, therefore the controlls are quite simple.

Move with the Arrow Keys 

Shoot with the Space Bar

Press "R" to reset the game at any point

If your in the Shop or in the Start Menu press "S" to continue

Your buy upgrades in the Shop with the number keys: "1", "2" and "3".

Yup, thats it for controlls, told ya there are quite few :).
